title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. This creamy, rich pasta is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy. A beloved Indian dish with tender, flavorful chicken.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Authentic Mexican beef tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh vegetables, and homemade salsa. Perfect for family dinners or entertaining guests.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh Mediterranean salad with crisp vegetables, olives, feta cheese, and a tangy vinaigrette. Light, healthy, and bursting with flavor.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich, moist chocolate cake with a decadent chocolate frosting. Perfect for birthdays, celebrations, or any chocolate lover's dream dessert.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: Aromatic Thai green curry with coconut milk, fresh herbs, and your choice of protein. Spicy, creamy, and full of authentic Thai flavors.
